languages.text: "Отсутствие чужих советов, полагаю. В день, когда Кунрад убил Теодору, вместе с ней погибли все ее высшие офицеры — Морт, Абеляр, Идира, Равор, Вигдис... Когда я вступил{mf||а} в наследство, некому было учить меня быть Вольным Торговцем. Я разбирал{mf|ся|ась} со всем сам{mf||а} и выяснил{mf||а}, кем была Теодора фон Валанциус на самом деле".

"The lack of pointless advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her, including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."
languages.original_text: "Отсутствие чужих советов, полагаю. В день, когда Кунрад убил Теодору, вместе с ней погибли все ее высшие офицеры — Морт, Абеляр, Идира, Равор, Вигдис... Когда я вступил{mf||а} в наследство, некому было учить меня быть Вольным Торговцем. Я разбирал{mf|ся|ась} со всем сам{mf||а} и выяснил{mf||а}, кем была Теодора фон Валанциус на самом деле".

traits.locale_text: "The lack of unnecessary advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her — including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into the inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: « Ne pas avoir reçu de conseils inutiles doit avoir joué, j'imagine. Le jour où Kunrad a tué Théodora, tous ses officiers ont péri avec elle, y compris Mort, Abélard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... Lorsque j'ai hérité du titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, personne n'était là pour m'apprendre à remplir mes fonctions. J'ai dû me débrouiller {mf|seul|seule}, et c'est ainsi que j'ai découvert le vrai visage de Théodora von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "The lack of pointless advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her, including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."

traits.locale_text: « Ne pas avoir reçu de conseils inutiles doit avoir joué, j'imagine. Le jour où Kunrad a tué Théodora, tous ses officiers ont péri avec elle, y compris Mort, Abélard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... Lorsque j'ai hérité du titre de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, personne n'était là pour m'apprendre à remplir mes fonctions. J'ai dû me débrouiller {mf|seul|seule}, et c'est ainsi que j'ai découvert le vrai visage de Théodora von Valancius. »
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: «Supongo que de no recibir consejos inútiles. Cuando Kunrad mató a Theodora, todos sus oficiales murieron con ella: Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... Cuando recibí la herencia, no había nadie que me enseñara a ser Comerciante Independiente. Tuve que ocuparme de todo por mi cuenta. Así descubrí quién era en realidad Theodora von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "The lack of pointless advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her, including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que de no recibir consejos innecesarios. Cuando Kunrad mató a Theodora, todos sus oficiales murieron con ella: Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... Cuando recibí la herencia, no había nadie que me enseñara a ser Comerciante Independiente. Tuve que ocuparme de todo por mi cuenta. Así descubrí quién era en realidad Theodora von Valancius».
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: “我猜，可能是因为没有人给我那些屁用没有的建议吧。昆拉德杀害西奥多拉那天，她身边的所有军官都和她一起死了，包括莫特、阿贝拉德、伊迪拉、雷沃、维格迪斯……当我坐上宝座的时候，没有任何人教我该如何扮演行商浪人的角色。于是我亲自出马，解决了所有问题，还查出了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的真实身份。”
languages.original_text: "The lack of pointless advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her, including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."

traits.locale_text: “我猜，可能是因为没有人给我那些屁用没有的建议吧。昆拉德杀害西奥多拉那天，她身边的所有军官都和她一起死了，包括莫特、阿贝拉德、伊迪拉、雷沃、维格迪斯……当我继承她的遗产时，没有任何人教我该如何扮演行商浪人的角色。于是我亲自出马，解决了所有问题，还查出了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的真实身份。”
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: 「無駄な助言がなかったこと、だろうな。クンラッドがシオドーラを殺した日、モート、アベラルド、イディラ、ラヴォア、ヴィグディス…彼女の士官たちはすべて共に命を落とした。私が相続した時点で、自由開拓者としての心得を教えてくれる人は誰もいなかった。私は自分ですべてを処理し、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの正体を突き止めたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The lack of pointless advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her, including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."

traits.locale_text: 「無駄な助言がなかったこと、だろうな。クンラッドがシオドーラを殺した日、モート、アベラルド、イディラ、ラヴォア、ヴィグディス…彼女の士官たちはすべて共に命を落とした。私が相続した時点で、自由開拓者としての心得を教えてくれる人は誰もいなかった。私は自分ですべてを処理し、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの正体を突き止めたのだ」
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Der Mangel an sinnlosen Ratschlägen, nehme ich an. Als Kunrad Theodora getötet hat, sind alle ihre Offiziere mit ihr gestorben, darunter Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis ... Als ich das Erbe angetreten habe, gab es niemanden, der mich in das Leben als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} einführen konnte. Ich habe mich selbst um alles gekümmert und herausgefunden, wer Theodora von Valancius wirklich war."
languages.original_text: "The lack of pointless advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her, including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."

traits.locale_text: "Der Mangel an unnötigen Ratschlägen, nehme ich an. Als Kunrad Theodora getötet hat, sind alle ihre Offiziere mit ihr gestorben, darunter Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis ... Als ich das Erbe angetreten habe, gab es niemanden, der mich in das Leben als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} einführen konnte. Ich habe mich selbst um alles gekümmert und herausgefunden, wer Theodora von Valancius wirklich war."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Gereksiz tavsiyelerden uzak durduğum içindir sanırım. Kunrad'ın Theodora'yı öldürdüğü gün Mort, Abelard, İdira, Ravor, Vigdis de dâhil tüm subayları onunla beraber öldü... Mirasımı ele geçirdiğimde bana Hür Tacir olmayı öğretecek kimse yoktu. Her şeyi kendim hallettim ve Theodora von Valancius'un gerçekte kim olduğunu öğrendim."
languages.original_text: "The lack of pointless advice, I presume. On the day Kunrad killed Theodora, all of her officers died with her, including Mort, Abelard, Idira, Ravor, Vigdis... When I came into my inheritance, there was no one to teach me how to be a Rogue Trader. I handled everything myself and found out who Theodora von Valancius really was."
